facebook.title: Review rewards
facebook.summary: "How many manuscripts is it reasonable for a scientist to peer review in a year? Many researchers would estimate two or three dozen; Malcolm Jobling, a fish biologist at the University of Tromsø in Norway, says that he has racked up more than 125 already t

facebook.title: Review rewards
facebook.summary:
Unless there is reward for peer review,many won't take the job seriously. In some cases the peer review is based on Abstract.
Dr.A.Jagadeesh  Nellore(AP),India www.nature.com
